attributes.action: create a simple way of charging foreign vehicles coming into the uk for any length of time a daily rate road tax in line  with the size of the vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it would be a simple case of registering at port of entry,paying a deposit for the estimated length of stay and adjusting where necessary at port of departure as has been done in germany for years.This may also prevent a lot of over weight and mechanically faulty vehicles on our roads as the "cowboys" will not want to pay up! Bringing cheap fuel in ,in belly tanks etc should also be prevented as it impacts on our hauliers being at an unfair disadvantage.
